item.title: Adolf Hitler or George Bush
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

Do you have blacks, too?

ISNT FACT, and no he wouldnt say that, its common sense, kerry did say that in his presidental speech to arizona…

As young Americans, you have an important responsibility, which is to become good citizens.

he never said as young americans,and still your comment(about if they where americans they would already be citizens) if tehy where citizins, like is the guy who shots an old lady for 5 buck, hes an american citizen but hes not a GOOD citizen.

God told me to strike at al Qaida and I struck them, and then he instructed me to strike at Saddam, which I did, and now I am determined to solve the problem in the Middle East. If you help me I will act, and if not, the elections will come and I will have to focus on them.

congratz, your the next level of noobness, that news paper is a fake, how stupid do you think i am???

*Responsible for a $521 billion budget deficit - less than 4 years after inheriting a $200 billion surplus. [FACT]

how is he responisble??? he didnt do anything but run the country, i swear you just wanna blame shit on him, the debit is infact casue by everyone, since we import more than we export, so we end up indebit(but we are the top country so we dont have to pay it back)

*He pulled out of the Kyoto Agreement on Global Warming, which had been agreed upon by 178 other countries. [FACT]

no reaon wasting time, we can do alot better here in the us, than doing the shiting agreement, its all a matter of ability, instead of planning you should do what you can(or find a way)

*He is on pace to have taken more vacation than any president in history - including a 28-day vacation right before 9/11. Bush Jr. has taken 6 months of vacation in total. [FACT]
  1. how do you know it was a vactions, it could infact have been a secret mission to keep the peace(it could happen) we will never know, and also where do you get your facts, there so shady, next time do your homework
*Bush Jr. has set the all-time record for most people worldwide to simultaneously protest a leader (10 million people), shattering the record for protests against any person in the history of mankind. [FACT]

any prez could have done it too, all they had to do is create a war on a country, its becasue so many STUPID fuckers in the world including the us, would like to see 9/11 happen again and again, if the mother fuckers would actually know shit, then they would notice that terrioism hasnt had war yet, so they think, we can do what we want, but then we declared war, and we owned them, notice how come the us has yet to have a terroist attack since then?

*Bush Jr. is the first president in US History to enter office with a criminal record. [FACT]

LIES, we have had 72 presidents with a criminal record, along with the well worship geoge washington, and even abe lincon, also teddy rosevelt(great prez) had been arrested 7 times!

*To this day has not yet caught Osama. [FACT]

why hate him??? you didnt catch him, and no one else has, so that a stupid reason to hate him, that like blaming you for the sun being so hot…

*First president in US History to refuse United Nations election inspectors (during the 2002 U.S. Elections). [FACT]

lie, again he did accept them and they did inspect the election, wich my infact be the reason for kerry quiting his election.

*Responsible for an unemployment rate of 6%, there are now 9 million people out of work in America, 3.3 million more than when Bush took office. [FACT]

FUCK, how can you blame him for this??? he didnt do it, did you know the us population grow 25.3 million a year??? so how do you expect for 25.3 million people to get a job, i bet you cant even find a job, how do you expect someone who doesnt speak english

also american are lazy, bush isnt responsible for that…

*For lying about WMD's in Iraq. To this day none have been found [FACT]

again to this day, so what if we find them tomorrow, or what if saddam shiped them to another country??? or maybe even he destroyed them so bush would look bad… also the WMDs were just a cover for us to take out a dictator, saddam had been in office for 10 years and had killed 500,000 of his own people becasue they wouldnt wear yellow on tuesdays(and yet you hate bush)

*Spent over 166 billion dollars to blow up two third world countries that posed no threat to us. [FACT]

it doesnt mean shit if they dont pose a threat to us(no country does) once again saddam is an evil dictator^^ and osama is a terroist that killed over 2,000 american citizens, so does that mean we cant do anything about that, if you ran the country we would just be walked all over by terroist and shit, since you would be like, oh you kill 500,000 people in new york, nice job mate, keep up the good work…

*Has not attended one US soldierâ€™s funeral. [FACT]

once again lie, he has attended over 400 us soldiers in the past 2 years, and possibly his vacitions that he took, could have been to visit the families of the dead soldiers

*The first net loss of jobs since Herbert Hoover. Yes, that Herbert Hoover from the Great Depression. [FACT]

you sound more noobish every time you type something, okay here we go, the us grows 27.3 million people a year, and since america is lazy and dont wanna work, bussiness go to other countries for people that will work harder for half the money, its not bushes fault, its YOUR FAULT, and everyone else that sits around blaming bush becasue they cant get a job, bush has no controll of this country, thats the senate, he just runs the military…

*At the presidential conventions, protesters are to be cordoned off in cages with razor wire. These are referred to as â€œfree speech zonesâ€. [FACT]

its for his protection, what if you knew that 50,000 americans who hated you(becasue their so stupid)
wouldnt you ask for protection, or who you let them storm teh stage and kill you???

conclusion

YOU ARE A FUCKING LAZY ASS BUM, WHO BLAMES BUSH FOR YOUR PROBLEMS BECASUE YOUR TOO STUPID TO ADDMIT THAT YOU SUCK AT LIFE.

item.title: Adolf Hitler or George Bush
item.dc:creator: @muerte4 muerte4
item.description:
@muerte4 wrote:

not really u weakly tried to discredit three quotes

Do you have blacks, too?

Isn’t fact but certainly sounds like something he would say.

As young Americans, you have an important responsibility, which is to become good citizens.

Here you missed the point, the fact is that he wrote this to English students… last time I checked England wasn’t America

God told me to strike at al Qaida and I struck them, and then he instructed me to strike at Saddam, which I did, and now I am determined to solve the problem in the Middle East. If you help me I will act, and if not, the elections will come and I will have to focus on them.

HE DID SAY THIS, it was reported in an Israeli newspaper called Haaretz. The link to the article can be found here - http://www.haaretz.com/hasen/pages/ShArt.jhtml?itemNo=310788&contrassID=2&subContrassID=1&sbSubContrassID=0&listSrc=Y [please delete if no linking allowed]

Next, you go on to discredit 14 facts with two weak sentences, lets analyse it closely

Doomsday: “they are all fact,” - SO YOU AGREE WITH ME?
Doomsday: “facts are thing that are neccisarly true” - HMMM I’M NOT SO SURE, why don’t we look at the definition of FACT

Definitions:

An indisputable truth.
Something that is known to have happened or to be true or to exist
An actual event or a true statement.

Doomsday’s definition:

“facts are thing that are neccisarly true”

hmmmm, it seems that your knowledge of the word FACT and what it means is limited =P

Continuing…

Doomsday: “just can be proven true or false, wich they are all false” - well obviously this is impossible, just look at the definitions.

Yep, so if your gonna try and PWN me or watever u want to call it, you may want to create a stronger argument, rather than making up some random shit and calling me a noob

item.title: Adolf Hitler or George Bush
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

[quote=“muerte4, post:54, topic:2130”]list of reasons to hate bush =D

*Responsible for a $521 billion budget deficit - less than 4 years after inheriting a $200 billion surplus. [FACT]

*Choked on a pretzel and nearly lost his life while seated in front of a TV. [FACT]

*He pulled out of the Kyoto Agreement on Global Warming, which had been agreed upon by 178 other countries. [FACT]

*He is on pace to have taken more vacation than any president in history - including a 28-day vacation right before 9/11. Bush Jr. has taken 6 months of vacation in total. [FACT]

*Bush Jr. has set the all-time record for most people worldwide to simultaneously protest a leader (10 million people), shattering the record for protests against any person in the history of mankind. [FACT]

*Bush Jr. is the first president in US History to enter office with a criminal record. [FACT]

*To this day has not yet caught Osama. [FACT]

*First president in US History to refuse United Nations election inspectors (during the 2002 U.S. Elections). [FACT]

*Responsible for an unemployment rate of 6%, there are now 9 million people out of work in America, 3.3 million more than when Bush took office. [FACT]

*For lying about WMD’s in Iraq. To this day none have been found [FACT]

*Spent over 166 billion dollars to blow up two third world countries that posed no threat to us. [FACT]

*Has not attended one US soldiers funeral. [FACT]

*The first net loss of jobs since Herbert Hoover. Yes, that Herbert Hoover from the Great Depression. [FACT]

*At the presidential conventions, protesters are to be cordoned off in cages with razor wire. These are referred to as free speech zones. [FACT]

U hate me don’t you? lol, well i don’t care let me have it XD

Below are bush quotes… dunno … just to prove his a dumass

Bush:

As young Americans, you have an important responsibility, which is to become good citizens.

– George W. Bush, in a June, 2001, letter to British students at Oakhill College in Lancashire, England: but giving the benefit where doubt is due, we ask, had they been Americans, wouldn’t they already be citizens?

Bush:

God told me to strike at al Qaida and I struck them, and then he instructed me to strike at Saddam, which I did, and now I am determined to solve the problem in the Middle East. If you help me I will act, and if not, the elections will come and I will have to focus on them.

Bush:

Do you have blacks, too?

– George W. Bush, meeting with Brazilian President Fernando Henrique Cardoso; allegedly, in this incident, reportedly witnessed only by members of the White House Press Corps, Condoleezza Rice was present and jumped in to save Cardoso from having to answer, informing Bush that in fact Brazil is home to more blacks than any country outside Africa

Bush:

This crusade, this war on terrorism is going to take a while.[/quote]

they are all fact, facts are thing that are neccisarly true, just can be proven true or false, wich they are all false(except the pretzel incident, have u ever watched comedy while eating, ive choked several times like that, carlos menica :D)

oh and

Do you have blacks, too?
-- George W. Bush, meeting with Brazilian President Fernando Henrique Cardoso; allegedly, in this incident, reportedly witnessed only by members of the White House Press Corps, Condoleezza Rice was present and jumped in to save Cardoso from having to answer, informing Bush that in fact Brazil is home to more blacks than any country outside Africa [/noob] ha ha ha if it was only witnessed by the whitehouse people, how do you know about it, and also how do we know its true???

and and this one

As young Americans, you have an important responsibility, which is to become good citizens.
-- George W. Bush, in a June, 2001, letter to British students at Oakhill College in Lancashire, England: but giving the benefit where doubt is due, we ask, had they been Americans, wouldn't they already be citizens? [/noob]

God told me to strike at al Qaida and I struck them, and then he instructed me to strike at Saddam, which I did, and now I am determined to solve the problem in the Middle East. If you help me I will act, and if not, the elections will come and I will have to focus on them.

YOU CANT BELIVE EVERYTHING YOU READ(just what i post)
